entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character and protagonist of the story. He is mentioned as someone who ran away from home and was picked up by the Knight Bus.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is Harry's friend and companion. He is mentioned as wandering off with Harry into the Forbidden Forest.

entities.name: sirius black
entities.description: Sirius Black is a person who escaped from Azkaban prison. His escape is mentioned as a significant event in the story.

entities.name: molly
entities.description: Molly is someone who is talking to another character about Sirius Black and Harry's safety.

entities.name: fudge
entities.description: Fudge is a person who is mentioned as telling the Daily Prophet that they are no nearer catching Sirius Black.

entities.name: hogwarts
entities.description: Hogwarts is a school where Harry will be perfectly safe. It is also mentioned as a place where Sirius Black might break in.

entities.name: azkaban
entities.description: Azkaban is a prison from which Sirius Black escaped.

entities.name: daily prophet
entities.description: The Daily Prophet is a newspaper that publishes Fudge's statements about the search for Sirius Black.

entities.name: knight bus
entities.description: The Knight Bus is a vehicle that picked up Harry after he ran away from home.
